text: Hybolasius viridescens is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1874. It is known from New Zealand.BioLib.cz - Hybolasius viridescens. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1874
title: Hybolasius viridescens
